english_example_sentence: As the smartest student of the school, you are the one who knows everything.
russian_example_sentence: Как самый умный ученик школы, вы тот, кто всё знает.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, okulun en zeki öğrencisi olarak her şeyi bilensiniz.
